pokemon.name: Bulbasaur
funFacts: This pokemon is known as the Seed Pokémon.
This pokemon is the only unevolved dual-type starter Pokémon.
This pokemon has a bulb on its back that grows into a large plant as it evolves.
This pokemon can survive for days solely on sunlight.
In the Pokémon anime, Ash's of this pokemon refused to evolve.

pokemon.name: Venusaur
funFacts: This pokemon's flower releases a soothing aroma that calms its opponents.
This pokemon can harness solar energy to launch Solar Beam attacks.
This pokemon's flower blooms more vividly after a rainy day.
In Mega Evolution, This pokemon gains thick fat that reduces damage from Fire and Ice-type moves.
This pokemon appears in the Super Smash Bros. series as a Poké Ball summon.

pokemon.name: Charmander
funFacts: This pokemon's tail flame indicates its health and mood.
If This pokemon's tail flame goes out, it is said to die.
This pokemon can learn Dragon-type moves despite not being a Dragon-type Pokémon.
This pokemon is known as the Lizard Pokémon.
This pokemon is the first Fire-type Pokémon in the National Pokédex.

pokemon.name: Charizard
funFacts: This pokemon is known for its fierce loyalty and fiery breath.
This pokemon can Mega Evolve into two forms.
Despite its dragon-like appearance, This pokemon is not a Dragon-type Pokémon.
In the Pokémon anime, Ash has one of this pokemon.
This pokemon can learn the move 'Fly' in most Pokémon games.

pokemon.name: Squirtle
funFacts: This pokemon is known as the Tiny Turtle Pokémon.
This pokemon's shell is not just for protection; its rounded shape helps it swim quickly.
In the anime, This pokemon was the leader of a Squad before joining Ash.
This pokemon evolves starting at level 16.
This pokemon can learn powerful Water-type moves like Hydro Pump.

pokemon.name: Metapod
funFacts: This pokemon is known as the Cocoon Pokémon.
This pokemon evolves at level 10.
This pokemon's shell is extremely hard and offers strong defense against predators.
This pokemon is almost immobile due to its upcoming transformation.
In the anime, This pokemon is often depicted as using Harden to defend itself.

pokemon.name: Butterfree
funFacts: This pokemon is known for its beautiful, colorful wings.
This pokemon can learn powerful status moves like Sleep Powder and Stun Spore.
In the anime, This pokemon was one of Ash's first captures.
This pokemon has compound eyes that allow it to see in all directions.
This pokemon loves to collect honey from flowers.

pokemon.name: Weedle
funFacts: This pokemon is known as the Hairy Bug Pokémon.
This pokemon's stinger is venomous and can be used for self-defense.
This pokemon evolves at level 7.
This pokemon's sense of smell is highly developed, helping it find leaves to eat.
This pokemon is one of the few Pokémon that can be found early in the wild in most Pokémon games.

pokemon.name: Kakuna
funFacts: This pokemon is known as the Cocoon Pokémon.
This pokemon evolves at level 7 and then again at level 10.
This pokemon remains almost completely still as it prepares to evolve.
This pokemon's body is protected by a hard shell, making it difficult to damage.
In the anime, This pokemon often hangs from trees, blending in with its surroundings.

pokemon.name: Beedrill
funFacts: This pokemon is known for its aggressive nature and powerful stingers.
This pokemon can Mega Evolve.
This pokemon attacks in swarms to overwhelm its opponents.
This pokemon's stingers can inject potent venom.
In the anime, This pokemon is often depicted as a threat to those who disturb its nest.

pokemon.name: Pidgey
funFacts: This pokemon is known as the Tiny Bird Pokémon.
This pokemon has a gentle nature and prefers to avoid conflict.
This pokemon evolves at level 18.
This pokemon can use its keen sense of direction to return home from long distances.
In the anime, This pokemon is often seen as one of the first wild Pokémon encountered by trainers.

pokemon.name: Pidgeot
funFacts: This pokemon is known for its impressive speed and majestic appearance.
This pokemon can Mega Evolve.
This pokemon's powerful wings can create gusts of wind capable of knocking down trees.
This pokemon's eyesight is so sharp that it can spot prey from great distances.
In the anime, Ash's has this pokemon.

pokemon.name: Rattata
funFacts: This pokemon is known as the Mouse Pokémon.
This pokemon's teeth grow continuously and must be worn down by gnawing.
This pokemon evolves at level 20.
This pokemon is extremely adaptable and can live in a variety of environments.
In the anime, This pokemon often appears as a common pest in cities and towns.

pokemon.name: Fearow
funFacts: This pokemon is known for its long neck and powerful beak.
This pokemon can fly for an entire day without needing to rest.
This pokemon evolves from its preevolution at level 20.
This pokemon's beak is strong enough to pierce through tough materials.
In the anime, This pokemon is often depicted as a fierce and territorial Pokémon.

pokemon.name: Ekans
funFacts: This pokemon is known as the Snake Pokémon.
This pokemon can slither silently through grass to ambush its prey.
This pokemon evolves at level 22.
This pokemon can use its tongue to detect the scent of prey.
In the anime, This pokemon is often seen alongside its trainer, Jessie of Team Rocket.

pokemon.name: Pikachu
funFacts: This pokemon is the mascot of the Pokémon franchise.
This pokemon evolves when exposed to a Thunder Stone.
This pokemon stores electricity in its cheeks and releases it in powerful electric attacks.
In the anime, This pokemon is Ash's first Pokémon.
This pokemon can learn a wide variety of moves, including Iron Tail and Volt Tackle.

pokemon.name: Sandshrew
funFacts: This pokemon is known as the Mouse Pokémon.
This pokemon can curl up into a ball to protect itself from attacks.
This pokemon evolves at level 22.
This pokemon prefers to live in dry, sandy areas.
In the Alola region, This pokemon has an Ice/Steel-type regional form.

pokemon.name: Sandslash
funFacts: This pokemon is known for its sharp claws and spiny back.
This pokemon can roll into a ball to attack or defend.
This pokemon's claws are strong enough to dig through rock.
In the Alola region, This pokemon has an Ice/Steel-type regional form.
This pokemon is often depicted as a quick and agile Pokémon in battle.

pokemon.name: Nidoking
funFacts: This pokemon is known for its incredible strength and power.
This pokemon evolves from its preevolution when exposed to a Moon Stone.
This pokemon's horn can pierce through steel.
This pokemon can learn a variety of powerful moves, including Earthquake and Megahorn.
In the anime, This pokemon often appears as a formidable opponent.

pokemon.name: Clefairy
funFacts: This pokemon is known for its connection to the moon.
This pokemon evolves when exposed to a Moon Stone.
This pokemon gathers in places bathed in moonlight to dance and play.
This pokemon's wings allow it to float gently down to the ground.
In the anime, This pokemon was once considered as the mascot of the Pokémon franchise.

pokemon.name: Vulpix
funFacts: This pokemon is known for its beautiful, six-tailed appearance.
This pokemon evolves when exposed to a Fire Stone.
This pokemon can control fire with its breath.
In the Alola region, This pokemon has an Ice-type regional form.
This pokemon is often depicted as a loyal and affectionate Pokémon.

pokemon.name: Ninetales
funFacts: This pokemon is known for its long lifespan, living up to 1,000 years.
This pokemon can cast powerful curses on those who mistreat it.
Each of This pokemon' tails contains a mystical power.
In the Alola region, This pokemon has an Ice/Fairy-type regional form.
This pokemon is often depicted as a wise and mystical Pokémon in folklore.

pokemon.name: Jigglypuff
funFacts: This pokemon is known for its ability to put others to sleep by singing.
This pokemon evolves into Wigglytuff when exposed to a Moon Stone.
This pokemon's eyes can adjust to see in the dark.
In the anime, This pokemon is known for drawing on the faces of those it puts to sleep.
This pokemon is a popular character in the Super Smash Bros. series.

pokemon.name: Zubat
funFacts: This pokemon is known for its echolocation abilities.
This pokemon evolves at level 22.
This pokemon can fly silently through the night.
In caves, This pokemon can often be found in large colonies.
This pokemon lacks eyes and relies entirely on echolocation to navigate.

pokemon.name: Golbat
funFacts: This pokemon is known for its large mouth and sharp fangs.
This pokemon evolves when leveled up with high friendship.
This pokemon can drain the blood of its prey using its fangs.
This pokemon is often found in dark caves, hunting for prey.
In the anime, This pokemon is frequently used by Team Rocket members.

pokemon.name: Oddish
funFacts: This pokemon is known as the Weed Pokémon.
This pokemon evolves into Gloom at level 21.
This pokemon buries itself in the ground during the day to avoid sunlight.
This pokemon releases a toxic fluid from its leaves if threatened.
In the anime, This pokemon often appears in forests and grassy areas.

pokemon.name: Gloom
funFacts: This pokemon is known for the foul-smelling fluid it secretes.
This pokemon evolves when exposed to a Leaf Stone or Sunn Stone.
This pokemon's fluid is used to attract prey and deter predators.
This pokemon's drooling mouth releases a noxious gas.
In the anime, This pokemon is often depicted as a sleepy and lethargic Pokémon.

pokemon.name: Vileplume
funFacts: This pokemon is known for its large, colorful flower.
This pokemon's petals release a toxic pollen that can cause paralysis.
This pokemon evolved via Leaf Stone.
This pokemon's flower is said to be the largest in the Pokémon world.
In the anime, This pokemon often appears in lush, tropical areas.

pokemon.name: Altaria
funFacts: This pokemon evolves from its preevolution starting at level 35.
This pokemon can Mega Evolve.
This pokemon's singing can calm feelings of anger and hostility, making it popular in concert settings.
This pokemon is known for its fluffy, cloud-like wings, which allow it to soar gracefully in the sky.
In Mega form, This pokemon changes its type to Dragon/Fairy, gaining a new appearance and abilities.

pokemon.name: Zangoose
funFacts: This pokemon has a long-standing rivalry with Seviper, its arch-nemesis.
Its sharp claws are its primary weapon in battles, which it uses with great skill.
This pokemon has the ability Immunity, which prevents it from being poisoned.
Despite its fierce appearance, This pokemon is known to form strong bonds with its Trainer.
This pokemon's agility and speed make it a formidable opponent in battle.

pokemon.name: Seviper
funFacts: This pokemon is known for its long-standing feud with Zangoose.
Its tail is shaped like a sword and is used to inflict deep wounds on opponents.
This pokemon has powerful venom that can incapacitate its foes quickly.
It uses its long body to coil around and constrict its enemies.
This pokemon is often seen sharpening its tail to ensure it remains deadly in battle.

pokemon.name: Lunatone
funFacts: This pokemon is believed to have originated from space, giving it a mysterious aura.
It is often found in areas where meteorites are found.
This pokemon's eyes glow red when it becomes active during the full moon.
It has the ability Levitate, which makes it immune to Ground-type moves.
This pokemon's connection to the moon enhances its psychic abilities.

pokemon.name: Solrock
funFacts: This pokemon absorbs solar energy during the day, which it uses to fuel its psychic powers.
It is said to have been discovered in a desert by an expedition team.
This pokemon's body glows with intense light when it is at its most powerful.
It has the ability Levitate, rendering it immune to Ground-type moves.
This pokemon is often seen as a counterpart to Lunatone, reflecting the sun-moon dichotomy.

pokemon.name: Barboach
funFacts: This pokemon is covered in a slimy, slippery mucus that protects it from germs.
It can use its whiskers to sense its surroundings and detect movement in muddy water.
This pokemon is capable of living in both fresh and saltwater environments.
Its ability to burrow into mud helps it avoid predators and extreme weather conditions.
This pokemon's whiskers are so sensitive that they can detect the faintest vibrations in the water.

pokemon.name: Whiscash
funFacts: This pokemon can predict earthquakes and other natural disasters using its sensory whiskers.
It is known as the 'Whiskers Pokémon' due to its prominent whiskers.
This pokemon creates its nests at the bottom of muddy lakes and swamps.
It is extremely territorial and will use powerful tremors to drive away intruders.
This pokemon's body is capable of generating strong electric shocks to stun its prey.

pokemon.name: Corphish
funFacts: This pokemon is known for its tenacity and will fight even against larger opponents.
It can regenerate lost claws, making it a resilient fighter.
This pokemon is often found in polluted waters, as it can adapt to harsh environments.
It uses its powerful pincers to crush and crack open hard shells.
This pokemon has a curious nature and will explore its surroundings extensively.

pokemon.name: Crawdaunt
funFacts: This pokemon is extremely aggressive and territorial, often battling other Pokémon.
Its large pincers are strong enough to crush rocks.
This pokemon molts its shell regularly, growing larger each time.
It has the ability to live in both fresh and saltwater environments.
This pokemon is known for its distinctive star-shaped mark on its head.

pokemon.name: Baltoy
funFacts: This pokemon is believed to be an ancient Pokémon that was brought to life by mysterious forces.
It moves by spinning on its single foot, using centrifugal force to stay upright.
This pokemon is often found in ancient ruins, where it remains still for long periods.
It has the ability Levitate, making it immune to Ground-type moves.
This pokemon communicates with others of its kind through telepathy.

pokemon.name: Claydol
funFacts: This pokemon evolves from its preevolution when exposed to the mysterious energies of ancient ruins.
It has multiple eyes that allow it to see in all directions simultaneously.
This pokemon can shoot powerful beams from its hands and eyes in battle.
It is said to have been discovered in the ruins of an ancient civilization.
This pokemon's ability to Levitate makes it a versatile and mobile battler.

pokemon.name: Lileep
funFacts: This pokemon is a fossil Pokémon that has been brought back to life through scientific means.
It attaches itself to rocks and uses its tentacles to catch prey.
This pokemon's appearance is based on ancient sea lilies that lived millions of years ago.
It remains still to avoid detection by predators, blending in with the surrounding rocks.
This pokemon is known to live in shallow seas, where it can photosynthesize using its leaf-like appendages.

pokemon.name: Cradily
funFacts: This pokemon evolves from its preevolution starting at level 40.
It uses its long, flexible tentacles to ensnare prey and draw them into its mouth.
This pokemon's body can regenerate quickly, making it a durable Pokémon in battle.
It is capable of living in both marine and terrestrial environments.
This pokemon's fossil was discovered in ancient seabeds, indicating its prehistoric origins.

pokemon.name: Anorith
funFacts: This pokemon is a fossil Pokémon revived from a Claw Fossil.
It is believed to be one of the first Pokémon to walk on land.
This pokemon uses its sharp claws to catch and hold onto prey.
It swims by undulating the eight wings at the sides of its body.
This pokemon's design is based on ancient marine arthropods known as anomalocaridids.

pokemon.name: Armaldo
funFacts: This pokemon evolves from its preevolution starting at level 40.
It is known for its powerful, armor-plated body and sharp claws.
This pokemon can swim despite being primarily a land-dweller, using its wings to propel itself.
Its claws can cut through steel, making it a formidable opponent in battle.
This pokemon's fossilized remains were discovered in cliffs and seabeds.

pokemon.name: Feebas
funFacts: This pokemon is often compared to Magikarp for its weak appearance.
It can live in any kind of water, no matter how dirty or polluted.
This pokemon evolves when leveled up with high Beauty or when traded holding a Prism Scale.
It is often overlooked by trainers due to its shabby looks.
This pokemon is known for its resilience, thriving in environments other Pokémon avoid.

pokemon.name: Milotic
funFacts: This pokemon is known for its stunning beauty.
It is said to calm feelings of anger and hostility, creating a serene atmosphere.
This pokemon is often sought after by trainers for contests due to its elegant appearance.
Its presence is said to have a soothing effect on people and Pokémon alike.
This pokemon can purify dirty water, making it clear and healthy again.

pokemon.name: Drapion
funFacts: This pokemon is known as the 'Ogre Scorp' Pokémon.
Its claws are powerful enough to crush cars.
This pokemon has a 360-degree field of vision due to its eyes on its head.
It can survive for up to a month without food.
This pokemon is immune to Psychic-type moves thanks to its Dark typing.

pokemon.name: Croagunk
funFacts: This pokemon stores poison in its cheeks and releases it through its fingers.
Its poison is used in traditional medicine in some regions.
This pokemon's cheeks inflate when it is about to attack.
It is known for its playful and mischievous nature.
This pokemon is often seen mimicking humans in an attempt to communicate.

pokemon.name: Toxicroak
funFacts: This pokemon's knuckle claws secrete a potent toxin.
It croaks loudly to signal its territory.
This pokemon is highly skilled in hand-to-hand combat.
Its poison can weaken the muscles of its opponents.
This pokemon is known for its sinister grin.

pokemon.name: Carnivine
funFacts: This pokemon lures its prey with a sweet-smelling saliva.
It can clamp down on prey with its powerful jaws.
This pokemon's vines can extend and contract like tentacles.
It typically waits motionless for hours, waiting for prey to come close.
This pokemon's design is based on carnivorous plants, particularly the Venus flytrap.

pokemon.name: Finneon
funFacts: This pokemon is known as the 'Wing Fish' Pokémon.
Its tail fin shines in a rainbow of colors.
This pokemon swims by fluttering its wing-like fins elegantly.
It can light up its tail fin to communicate with others of its kind.
This pokemon is often seen swimming near the surface of the water.

pokemon.name: Lumineon
funFacts: This pokemon evolves from its preevolution starting at level 31.
It uses its light-emitting fins to attract prey in the dark ocean depths.
This pokemon is known for its graceful and agile swimming.
It can use the light from its fins to communicate and navigate.
This pokemon often competes with Lanturn for food.

pokemon.name: Mantyke
funFacts: This pokemon evolves when leveled up with a Remoraid in the party.
Its body is covered in a layer of mucus that provides protection.
This pokemon can glide over the water's surface, using its fins like wings.
This pokemon often swims in schools.
This pokemon's friendly nature makes it popular among trainers.

pokemon.name: Snover
funFacts: This pokemon's body is covered in a layer of snow, which provides camouflage.
It is known as the 'Frost Tree' Pokémon.
This pokemon can survive in harsh, snowy environments.
It releases a sweet sap from its body, which attracts wildlife.
This pokemon's appearance changes with the seasons, turning greener in summer.

pokemon.name: Abomasnow
funFacts: This pokemon evolves from its preevolution starting at level 40.
It can create blizzards by whipping up snowstorms with its arms.
This pokemon is known as the 'Frost Tree' Pokémon.
Its Mega Evolution gains increased bulk and power.
This pokemon's presence is said to be a sign of impending snowstorms.

pokemon.name: Weavile
funFacts: This pokemon evolves from its preevoltion when leveled up holding a Razor Claw at night.
It is known for its speed and agility in battle.
This pokemon forms packs that hunt prey together.
Its claws are sharp enough to cut through ice and stone.
This pokemon uses its intelligence to outsmart opponents.

pokemon.name: Magnezone
funFacts: This pokemon evolves from Magneton when leveled up in a special magnetic field.
It can generate powerful magnetic forces to control metal objects.
This pokemon's three units can attack independently or together.
It emits radio waves to communicate with other This pokemon.
This pokemon is known for its UFO-like appearance.

pokemon.name: Lickilicky
funFacts: This pokemon evolves from its preevolution when it learns the move Rollout.
Its tongue can extend over 82 feet and is dexterous enough to manipulate objects.
This pokemon's saliva has a numbing effect.
It stores excess food in its throat pouch.
This pokemon is known for its gluttonous appetite.

pokemon.name: Rhyperior
funFacts: This pokemon evolves from its preevoltuion when traded holding a Protector.
It can launch boulders and Geodude from its hands like missiles.
This pokemon's hide is extremely tough, providing excellent defense.
It uses its powerful horn to drill through rock and soil.
This pokemon's body is partially covered in a rocky armor.

pokemon.name: Tangrowth
funFacts: This pokemon evolves from its preevoltuion when leveled up knowing Ancient Power.
Its arms are made of vines that can extend and retract.
This pokemon can ensnare prey with its vine-like arms.
It is known for its regenerative abilities, quickly regrowing lost vines.
This pokemon is often mistaken for a moving shrub in the wild.

pokemon.name: Electivire
funFacts: This pokemon evolves from its preevoltuion when traded holding an Electirizer.
It can generate electrical voltages up to 20,000 volts.
This pokemon's tails act as powerful electrical generators.
It can plug its tails into electric sockets to recharge.
This pokemon is known for its competitive spirit and raw power.

pokemon.name: Magmortar
funFacts: This pokemon evolves from its preevoltuion when traded holding a Magmarizer.
It can shoot fireballs from its arm cannons.
This pokemon's body temperature can exceed 2,200 degrees Fahrenheit.
It lives in volcanic craters where it can absorb lava to power its attacks.
This pokemon's flames are hot enough to melt boulders.

pokemon.name: Togekiss
funFacts: This pokemon evolves from its preevoltuion when exposed to a Shiny Stone.
It is known for bringing blessings and joy to people.
This pokemon avoids conflict and dislikes strife.
Its presence is said to bring good fortune to trainers.
This pokemon can share its serene aura to calm those around it.

pokemon.name: Yanmega
funFacts: This pokemon evolves from its preevoltuion when leveled up knowing Ancient Power.
It can produce shockwaves with its wingbeats to stun prey.
This pokemon's eyes provide a wide field of vision.
It is known for its incredible speed and maneuverability in flight.
This pokemon's jaw strength allows it to crush insect exoskeletons easily.

pokemon.name: Leafeon
funFacts: This pokemon evolves from its preevoltuion when leveled up near a Moss Rock.
It has the ability to photosynthesize, providing it with energy from sunlight.
This pokemon's fur emits a fresh, clean scent reminiscent of grass.
It can purify air around it, making forests healthy and lush.
This pokemon's leaf-like tail is both sharp and flexible, used for slicing through obstacles.

pokemon.name: Stantler
funFacts: This pokemon's antlers can distort reality, creating illusions.
Its antlers are prized as a valuable material for making special glasses.
This pokemon's curved antlers subtly change the flow of air to confuse its opponents.
It can create a pleasant odor to calm and attract Pokémon.
This pokemon is known as the 'Big Horn' Pokémon.

pokemon.name: Smeargle
funFacts: This pokemon is known for its ability to use the move Sketch to permanently learn any move.
Its tail secretes a fluid that changes color with its emotions.
This pokemon often marks its territory with its tail paint.
Each This pokemon has a unique paint pattern on its tail.
It is known as the 'Painter' Pokémon.

pokemon.name: Tyrogue
funFacts: This pokemon evolves into 3 different pokemon depending on its stats.
It is known for its energetic and tenacious nature.
This pokemon constantly trains to become stronger and improve its fighting skills.
It is known as the 'Scuffle' Pokémon.
This pokemon often challenges others to test its strength.

pokemon.name: Hitmontop
funFacts: This pokemon spins on its head to deliver powerful kicks.
It maintains balance by tightening its abdomen muscles.
This pokemon evolves from Tyrogue when its Defense is higher than its Attack.
It can spin at high speeds to evade attacks.
This pokemon is known for its unique fighting style, combining spinning and kicking.

pokemon.name: Smoochum
funFacts: This pokemon evolves starting at level 30.
It is known for constantly testing things with its lips.
This pokemon's lips are very sensitive, helping it to sense its surroundings.
It is known as the 'Kiss' Pokémon.
This pokemon is highly expressive and often shows its emotions through its behavior.

pokemon.name: Elekid
funFacts: EleThis pokemonkid evolves starting at level 30.
It generates electricity by spinning its arms.
This pokemon often zaps itself while playing.
Its body acts as a small generator, constantly emitting sparks.
This pokemon is known for its playful and mischievous nature.

pokemon.name: Magby
funFacts: This pokemon evolves into Magmar starting at level 30.
It breathes 1,100-degree Fahrenheit flames.
This pokemon can be seen practicing its fire-breathing in preparation for evolution.
Its health can be determined by the flames it breathes; when healthy it blow out yellow flames.
This pokemon is known for its energetic and curious personality.

pokemon.name: Miltank
funFacts: This pokemon produces highly nutritious milk, popular with both Pokémon and humans.
It is known for its calming and nurturing nature.
This pokemon can heal itself by drinking its own milk, using the move Milk Drink.
It is often found in dairy farms in the Pokémon world.
This pokemon's milk is said to make anyone who drinks it grow stronger.

pokemon.name: Blissey
funFacts: This pokemon evolves from its preevolution when leveled up with high friendship.
It is known for its extremely high HP and special defense stats.
This pokemon's eggs are filled with happiness and can soothe and calm emotions.
It is known as the 'Happiness' Pokémon.
This pokemon is often seen in Pokémon Centers, aiding in the care of sick or injured Pokémon.

pokemon.name: Raikou
funFacts: This pokemon is one of the Legendary Beasts revived by Ho-Oh.
It embodies the speed and power of lightning.
This pokemon can produce storm clouds to hide itself.
Its roar can create thunderclouds.
This pokemon travels swiftly, leaving a trail of sparks in its wake.

pokemon.name: Suicune
funFacts: This pokemon is one of the Legendary Beasts revived by Ho-Oh.
It embodies the purity and tranquility of flowing water.
This pokemon can purify dirty water with a mere touch.
It is known for its graceful and swift movements.
This pokemon is often seen racing across the surface of lakes and rivers.

pokemon.name: Larvitar
funFacts: This pokemon evolves starting at level 30.
It feeds on soil to gain the nutrients it needs to grow.
This pokemon is known for its determination and toughness.
It can move through the ground by eating its way through.
This pokemon is known as the 'Rock Skin' Pokémon.

pokemon.name: Pupitar
funFacts: This pokemon evolves from Larvitar starting at level 30 and evolves into Tyranitar starting at level 55.
Its body is as hard as bedrock, providing excellent defense.
This pokemon can move by expelling gas to propel itself forward.
It is known as the 'Hard Shell' Pokémon.
This pokemon is often found buried in the ground, waiting to evolve.

pokemon.name: Tyranitar
funFacts: This pokemon evolves from its preevolution starting at level 55.
It is known for its incredible strength and durability.
Tyranitar can create earthquakes by stamping its feet.
It is known as the 'Armor' Pokémon.
This pokemon's Mega Evolution, gains even greater power and defensive capabilities.

pokemon.name: Lugia
funFacts: This pokemon is known as the Guardian of the Seas.
It is said to be able to calm storms with its mere presence.
This pokemon's wings are so powerful that they can cause storms by just flapping them.
It prefers to live deep underwater to avoid causing accidental storms.
This pokemon is often associated with the Legendary Birds: Articuno, Zapdos, and Moltres.

pokemon.name: Kingler
funFacts: This pokemon's large claw is immensely powerful, capable of crushing even solid rock.
Its claw is so heavy that This pokemon sometimes struggles to lift it.
This pokemon can communicate with others by waving its claws around.
In the wild, This pokemon is often seen using its claw to dig up food from the sea floor.
This pokemon evolves from its preevolution starting at level 28.

pokemon.name: Voltorb
funFacts: This pokemon is known for its resemblance to a Poké Ball.
It was first discovered in a company manufacturing Poké Balls.
This pokemon is known to self-destruct when threatened.
Its origins are a mystery, and some believe it may be an artificial Pokémon.
This pokemon is often found near power plants and other electrical sources.

pokemon.name: Exeggcute
funFacts: This pokemon is a group of six eggs that communicate via telepathy.
It evolves when exposed to a Leaf Stone.
Despite their appearance, This pokemon are more like seeds than actual eggs.
If an This pokemon becomes separated, it quickly reunites with the others.
They gather under trees to avoid being eaten by bird Pokémon.

pokemon.name: Cubone
funFacts: This pokemon is known as the 'Lonely Pokémon' due to its solitary nature.
It wears the skull of its deceased mother as a helmet.
This pokemon cries for its lost mother, and the sound is said to echo mournfully.
It evolves starting at level 28.
This pokemon's bone club is its primary weapon, which it uses skillfully in battle.

pokemon.name: Hitmonlee
funFacts: This pokemon is known for its incredibly powerful and flexible legs.
It can extend its legs to kick opponents from a distance.
This pokemon evolves from Tyrogue when its Attack is higher than its Defense.
It is known as the 'Kicking Fiend' due to its martial arts prowess.
This pokemon's kicks are so fast that they can leave its opponents unable to move.

pokemon.name: Hitmonchan
funFacts: This pokemon specializes in punching moves and has a punch for every situation.
It evolves from Tyrogue when its Defense is higher than its Attack.
This pokemon's punches are incredibly fast and powerful.
It is known as the 'Punching Demon' due to its boxing skills.
This pokemon wears a unique tunic and skirt, resembling a boxer's attire.

pokemon.name: Lickitung
funFacts: This pokemon's tongue is over six feet long and can be extended at will.
Its tongue is covered in a sticky substance that can cause rashes if touched.
This pokemon can use its tongue for a variety of purposes, including battle and exploration.
It evolves into Lickilicky when leveled up while knowing the move Rollout.
This pokemon's sense of taste is highly developed, allowing it to taste even the faintest flavors.

pokemon.name: Koffing
funFacts: This pokemon is filled with toxic gases that it can expel to attack its foes.
It is often found in polluted areas and thrives in toxic environments.
This pokemon evolves starting at level 35.
It is known for its happy and carefree demeanor, despite its toxic nature.
This pokemon can hover in the air by inflating the gases inside its body.

pokemon.name: Rhyhorn
funFacts: This pokemon's body is covered in a rock-hard hide that protects it from attacks.
It charges at anything that comes in its way, showing little regard for obstacles.
This pokemon evolves into Rhydon starting at level 42.
Despite its tough exterior, This pokemon has a relatively simple and forgetful mind.
It is known as the 'Spikes' Pokémon due to the sharp points on its body.

pokemon.name: Chansey
funFacts: This pokemon is known for its gentle and nurturing nature, often helping others.
It carries a special egg in its pouch that is filled with happiness.
This pokemon evolves from its preevolution when leveled up while holding an Oval Stone during the day.
It can heal other Pokémon using its highly nutritious egg.
This pokemon's egg is so delicious that it is a favorite among people and Pokémon alike.

pokemon.name: Entei
funFacts: This pokemon is one of the Legendary Beasts revived by Ho-Oh.
It embodies the ferocity and intensity of volcanic eruptions.
Whenever This pokemon roars, a volcano erupts somewhere in the world.
It can run across the land at incredible speeds.
This pokemon's presence brings intense heat and flames.

pokemon.name: Torchic
funFacts: This pokemon evolves into Combusken starting at level 16.
It has a flame sac inside its belly that keeps it warm.
This pokemon is known for its cheerful and friendly nature.
It can spit fireballs capable of scorching its foes.
This pokemon often follows its Trainer around, seeking warmth and protection.

pokemon.name: Mudkip
funFacts: This pokemon evolves into Marshtomp starting at level 16.
Its fin acts as a highly sensitive radar, helping it sense movements in the water.
This pokemon is known for its playful and adventurous nature.
It can crush rocks with its powerful jaws.
This pokemon is often found in swamps and wetlands.

pokemon.name: Rotom
funFacts: This pokemon can inhabit electrical appliances, changing its form and type.
It is known for its mischievous and playful behavior.
This pokemon's name is derived from 'motor,' reflecting its ability to possess machines.
In its different forms, This pokemon can take on various types like Water, Fire, Ice, and more.
This pokemon is often found in places with a lot of electrical equipment, such as power plants.

pokemon.name: Lanturn
funFacts: This pokemon is known as the 'Light Pokémon' due to its ability to emit light from its antenna.
It uses its light to attract and stun prey in deep ocean waters.
This pokemon's light can illuminate the darkest depths of the ocean.
It evolves from its preevolution starting at level 27.
This pokemon's light is often mistaken for a star by sailors.

pokemon.name: Natu
funFacts: This pokemon is known for its keen ability to foresee the future using its psychic powers.
It often stands still to observe its surroundings, appearing almost statue-like.
This pokemon evolves starting at level 25.
Its large eyes give it a wide field of vision.
This pokemon is often found in ruins, where it perches quietly.

pokemon.name: Shuckle
funFacts: This pokemon is known for its incredibly high Defense and Special Defense stats.
It stores berries inside its shell, which it uses to create berry juice.
Despite its defensive prowess, This pokemon is very slow.
This pokemon's shell is so tough that it can withstand a blow from a powerful Pokémon.
In the wild, This pokemon hides under rocks to avoid predators.

pokemon.name: Teddiursa
funFacts: This pokemon loves to collect and eat honey, which it stores in its paws.
It evolves starting at level 30.
This pokemon's paws are always sticky with honey.
It uses its sensitive nose to find honey hidden by other Pokémon.
This pokemon often licks its paws to taste the honey it collects.

pokemon.name: Slugma
funFacts: This pokemon's body is made of molten lava, and it needs to stay hot to remain active.
It evolves into Magcargo starting at level 38.
This pokemon is known for its slow movement, as it crawls along the ground.
If it cools down, its body will harden and it will become immobile.
This pokemon can melt through rocks and other obstacles using its fiery body.

pokemon.name: Delibird
funFacts: This pokemon carries food in its tail, which it uses to help other Pokémon.
It is known as the 'Delivery Pokémon' due to its habit of giving food to those in need.
This pokemon's signature move, Present, can either heal or damage its target.
It often travels long distances to deliver food and aid.
This pokemon's cheerful nature and gift-giving habits make it popular among trainers.

pokemon.name: Phanpy
funFacts: This pokemon uses its strong trunk to shower itself with water and keep cool.
It evolves starting at level 25.
This pokemon is known for its playful and friendly nature.
Its large ears help it to hear distant sounds and sense approaching danger.
This pokemon's trunk is powerful enough to lift and carry heavy objects.

pokemon.name: Gengar
funFacts: This pokemon is known for its mischievous and sinister behavior, often playing tricks on people.
It evolves from Haunter when traded, and is the final form of Gastly.
This pokemon can hide in shadows and is known to steal the heat from its surroundings.
It is said that This pokemon emerges from darkness to attack its prey.
This pokemon's presence can chill the air, causing a noticeable drop in temperature.

pokemon.name: Mewtwo
funFacts: This pokemon was created through genetic manipulation and is known as the 'Genetic Pokémon'.
It has incredible psychic powers, said to be the result of DNA splicing.
This pokemon is one of the most powerful Pokémon in existence.
It was originally created to be a weapon, but became self-aware and escaped.
This pokemon has been featured prominently in various Pokémon movies and media.
